scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:js && pnpm run lint:ts
scripts.test:e2e:docker:br: pnpm run test:e2e:docker:build && pnpm run test:e2e:docker:run
scripts.test:e2e:docker:build: sudo docker build -t test-e2e_development --build-arg UID=$(id -u) --build-arg GID=$(id -g) --target test-e2e_development ..
scripts.test:e2e:docker:run: sudo docker run --rm -v "$PWD/..:/srv/app" -v "$(pnpm store path):/srv/.pnpm-store" test-e2e_development
scripts.test:e2e:docker:server:dev: pnpm run test:e2e:docker:br pnpm --dir tests run test:e2e:server:dev
scripts.test:e2e:docker:server:node: pnpm run test:e2e:docker:br pnpm --dir tests run test:e2e:server:node
scripts.test:e2e:docker:server:static: pnpm run test:e2e:docker:br pnpm --dir tests run test:e2e:server:static
scripts.test:e2e:server:dev: cross-env PORT=3000 SITE_URL=http://localhost:3000 VIO_SERVER=dev pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:server:node: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NUXT_PUBLIC_I18N_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3001 NUXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=http://localhost:3001 PORT=3001 VIO_SERVER=node pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:server:static: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3002 SITE_URL=http://localhost:3002 VIO_SERVER=static pnpm run test:e2e
